categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic locations

nodes.text: Unroola Dawn was a location affiliated with the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. It was lost in 3 ABY whilst the Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry and other rebel groups were escorting the Alliance Fleet out of the Mid Rim. Captain Micha Evon, the leader of the 61st, listed Unroola Dawn, along with Hope Station and Talrezan Four, as recent losses suffered by the Alliance during the retreat.
Unroola Dawn was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
